languages.text: {n}Молчание длится несколько секунд, и суровое равнодушие на лице Соломона дает трещину, во взгляде мелькает тень тревоги.{/n}
{n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Молчание длится несколько секунд, и суровое равнодушие на лице Соломона дает трещину, во взгляде мелькает тень тревоги.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}
{n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数秒間の沈黙が続いた後、ソロモーンの顔に張りついていた冷たい無関心が崩れ、彼の視線に一瞬、不安の影がちらついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数秒間の沈黙が続いた後、ソロモーンの顔に張りついていた冷たい無関心が崩れ、彼の視線に一瞬、不安の影がちらついた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stille hält einige Sekunden an, und dann schwindet die Gleichgültigkeit aus Solomornes Gesicht, und in seinem Blick flackert ein Schatten von Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stille hält einige Sekunden an, und dann schwindet die Gleichgültigkeit aus Solomornes Gesicht, und in seinem Blick flackert ein Schatten von Angst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le silence se prolonge quelques secondes, après quoi le masque d'indifférence feinte de Solomorne se fissure et son regard laisse transparaître une ombre d'angoisse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence se prolonge quelques secondes, après quoi le masque d'indifférence feinte de Solomorne se fissure et son regard laisse transparaître une ombre d'angoisse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El silencio se prolonga durante varios segundos, hasta que la adusta indiferencia de Solomorne se resquebraja y deja entrever un atisbo de ansiedad en su expresión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El silencio se prolonga durante varios segundos, hasta que la adusta indiferencia de Solomorne se resquebraja y deja entrever un atisbo de ansiedad en su expresión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉默持续了几秒钟，随后，索罗蒙脸上冷漠的面具裂开了，他的目光中闪烁着一丝焦虑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沉默持续了几秒钟，随后，索罗蒙脸上冷漠的面具裂开了，他的目光中闪烁着一丝焦虑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sessizlik birkaç saniye uzuyor, sonunda Solomorne'un soğuk ifadesinde endişenin gölgesi titreşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silence stretches for a few seconds, and then the hard indifference on Solomorne's face cracks, a shadow of anxiety flickering in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sessizlik birkaç saniye uzar, sonunda Solomorne'un soğuk ifadesinde bir endişe gölgesi titreşir.{/n}
